replies.body: WTF is 5?
Theoretical concept that supposedly exceeds perfection.  It's utter blasphemous baseless boisterous bull shit.
"Five is right out!" -_Monty Python and the Holy Grail_
Imprisonment by fire {{champion:1}}
"We decided that 4 shots wasn't enough, we're changing his shot count to 7 ---------_Riot Balance Team_"
WTF is 7?

> [{quoted}](name=4 Step Cadence,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=3Y8jByAE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-04-28T21:54:10.755+0000)
>
> WTF is 7?

Well, he went to jail...cause 7 8 9.
7/8 time is underrated. Way more interesting and intellectual than 4/4.
I don't think I've ever actually played a song in 7/8.  I've done plenty of 6/8, but never 7/8.

> [{quoted}](name=Digital Daddy,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=3Y8jByAE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-28T21:35:58.928+0000)
>
> "We decided that 4 shots wasn't enough, we're changing his shot count to 7 ---------_Riot Balance Team_"

wouldn't that be a nerf, as his final shot is the important one?
I prefer if you took the screenshot when you only needed 4 seconds to respawn.

Guys, I'm proud of you:

https://i.imgur.com/7cZwzGv.png[/img]
why didnt you screenshot when death timer at 4 seconds? :(
Sorry i need to upvote you.
